title: Bug 120216: Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
description: When adding a table report item without setting the dataset, there is an issue where the group dialog is not shown. However, the user should still be able to define a group even if the dataset is not defined. This bug report aims to address this issue.
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, attempting to create a new table group does not show the group dialog.
EB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, the user should still be able to create a new table group and the group dialog should be shown.
SR:
1. Add a table report item to the report without setting the dataset.
2. Try creating a new table group.
3. Verify that the group dialog is shown and allows the user to define a group, even without a dataset.
